Articles.Content:
Hello KSP Youtuber and/or viewer.

If you don't know me, and you got here by random you can see my YouTube homepage at: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCf1uRrjQlomRzRJ2VmzBc8Q/videos or my fourm post homepage at: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/85583-It-snorocketscience

I wanted to give you an update that the posting KSP episode #5 will be delayed until Friday Nov. 15 2013 (if all goes well). But if something goes wrong that would become Nov 16, maybe 17th, so on. But it may hopefully (I don't guarantee this) be posted tomorrow. Now, please watch the whole video if you can, but at least skip through and see the important details and the ending part (you will see when I publish it!). So, until then, see you later .

-It'snorocketscience
